channel.title: Should I Post My Album In SoundCloud or make it only a Spotify Exclusive?
channel.description: [poll type=regular public=true] * Both Souncloud And Spotify * Spotify Only * SoundCloud Only * Neither (wait, what? Tell me why below.) [/poll] It is releasing in the 26th of this month! Sorry for the delay!

item.title: Should I Post My Album In SoundCloud or make it only a Spotify Exclusive?
item.dc:creator: Xicon
item.description:
I was honestly thinking about doing that, just uploading this to stores THEN onto SoundCloud

Read full topic
item.source: Should I Post My Album In SoundCloud or make it only a Spotify Exclusive?

item.title: Should I Post My Album In SoundCloud or make it only a Spotify Exclusive?
item.dc:creator: stereofield
item.description:
NickElle:

And, make sure you add it to SC at the same time it comes out at stores.

If you have a set release date on SoundCloud, make sure to put it on Spotify 2 or 3 weeks before, setting the release date to your SoundCloud date

Read full topic
item.source: Should I Post My Album In SoundCloud or make it only a Spotify Exclusive?

item.title: Should I Post My Album In SoundCloud or make it only a Spotify Exclusive?
item.dc:creator: NickElle
item.description:
Yes, do it like that.

And, make sure you add it to SC at the same time it comes out at stores.

Read full topic

item.title: Should I Post My Album In SoundCloud or make it only a Spotify Exclusive?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Spotify, iTunes, etc… with previews on SC and links in the SC description to Spotify, iTunes, etc…

And add links to your Spotify artist page, etc… in your SC bio.

Read full topic
